definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: dian4 ci2 xiang1 hu4 zuo4 yong4

sentences.english: The influence of electromagnetic wave on biologic respiratory process is demonstrated by an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文用实验证实了电磁波对生物呼吸过程的影响。

sentences.english: On carrying our his experiment, Faraday discovered electromagnetic induction.
sentences.chinese: 在进行实验时，法拉第发现了电磁感应现象。

sentences.english: Harmful Electric Magnetic Field is virtually non-existing.
sentences.chinese: 有害的电磁场几乎是不存在的。

sentences.english: The generator represents magnetron, packaged with constants and electromagnets(2 coils magnetic) in the magnetic-shielded ceramic-metal execution.
sentences.chinese: 该磁控管的设计采用电磁石，封装采用金属陶瓷。

sentences.english: A gun like this would also be useful for stopping pirate attacks against commercial shipping.
sentences.chinese: 像这样的电磁炮同样也可用于阻止海盗袭击商用船只。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the structure, principle and effect of solenoid valve 21C.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了21C电磁阀的结构原理与作用。

sentences.english: When the solenoid coil is energized, oil in the tin-loader chamber flows to the low stage.
sentences.chinese: 当电磁线圈通电时，油中的锡装载机分庭流向低阶段。

sentences.english: The paper expatiate the design and application effects of electromagnetic liner.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了电磁衬板的设计及开发应用效果。

sentences.english: Using an ohmmeter, check the resistance between terminal 50 and the switch body.
sentences.chinese: 使用欧姆计，检查在电磁开关50和外壳之间的电阻。

sentences.english: EH4 electromagnetic system requires distant observation.
sentences.chinese: EH4电磁系统要求在“远区”观测。

sentences.english: These are the contact points for the EM ropes that connect to the planet.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是连接电磁线的接触点。

sentences.english: Cold-test parameter is the premise of the beam and wave interaction calculation.
sentences.chinese: 行波管的冷参量是电磁波与电子注互作用计算的基础。

sentences.english: Conclusion Electromagnetic fields can be used to reduce turbidity value and fluoride in water.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨复合电磁场降低水的浑浊度和除氟功能。

sentences.english: We present the design and fabrication proc ess of a novel electro-magnetically actuated micropump.
sentences.chinese: 主要阐述了一种新型电磁驱动微泵的设计和制作工艺。

sentences.english: The new technique of electromagnetic pulse vibration excitation is a kind of non-contact transient vibration excitation.
sentences.chinese: 新型电磁脉冲激振技术是一种非接触的瞬态激振。

sentences.english: The angle of incidence may be complex for electromagnetic waves.
sentences.chinese: 对于电磁波来说它的入射角为复角。
